author: Todd Kenreck
title: 'Halo 5: Guardians' And More For Decades To Come (Part 2)
text: [brightcove autostart=true videoID=4529713029001 playerID=] Halo 5 Guardians is only one part of a much more epic story to come for the Halo universe. Forbes Contributor Todd Kenreck speaks with head of 343 Industries Bonnie Ross, franchise development director Frank Oâ€™Connor, creative director Tim Longo and studio head of internal development Josh Holmes in this six part video series on Halo 5: Guardians. Published by Microsoft Studios, Halo 5: Guardians will be available for Xbox on Oct. 27, 2015.
